channel.title: For a RSC server what is the best exp rate? best aspect of game?
channel.description: hey whats up guys i wanna start a thread to get peoples thought on Ideal RSC. [b]In your own opinion.[/b] What is the best rate for a server? What is the best aspect of the game?(thing you like most about a server.) thanks for your time.

item.title: For a RSC server what is the best exp rate? best aspect of game?
item.dc:creator: @mona_lisa mona lisa
item.description:
@mona_lisa wrote:

27x exp rate.
only 3 accounts per i.p.

Read full topic

item.title: For a RSC server what is the best exp rate? best aspect of game?
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:6, topic:463066”][quote author=Pompano21 link=topic=566361.msg4118847#msg4118847 date=1349446346]

Skilling should be faster, except for mining and smithing should be slower than combat.

Your sig is wrong.

3 guys*
[/quote]

Man, you have some serious issues. I don’t know whether to laugh at you or feel sorry for how pathetic you are.[/quote]

On a serious note, why is your opinions so different to what you are working on. I thought you were doing mopar rsc which is low rates and replicating runescape classic?

Read full topic

item.title: For a RSC server what is the best exp rate? best aspect of game?
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:2, topic:463066”]In my own opinion.

  1. Should take one week to get a single 99 skill.
  2. Adventure.[/quote]
    thanks. I believe 15x is about a week for a 99 combat stat.
    How about skilling vs combat stats?? I think combat should be faster than skilling stats.

Read full topic
